channel.title: LOCKERZ - get electronics easily from this website!
channel.description:
Lockerz is a website where you can answer daily questions ( they are called dailies ) and you can invite people to gain points towards tons of different items.
the only way you can register with Lockerz is by getting an invite, thats why I'm posting this.
Now, I am new to this myself, i will admit, but there is many videos of people unboxing their gifts, so i want to give it a try.
If you want to get invited, send me an email with your email address in the message, and i will invite you. E-MAIL ADDRESS: i-frozen-i@live.ca
Here's a few videos showing people unboxing their items that they purchased.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e85-4vCG8og http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=19J39MxqYgE&feature=fvsr http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gfMm_9MmGNU http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S__zNrerC4w
So remember.. if you want an invite just E-MAIL ME!
~ i-frozen-i@live.ca
